this story revolves around  meghna mathur
and  aspiring fashion model  it follows
her transformation  from  small town girl
to super motor  the indian fashion industry
and the  carriers of several  other models
fashion also  explores  feminism
and female power  in indian fashion
the film also stars  arjan vajwa  and arwash khan
in supporting roles  the cast also features
several  professional  fashion models  playing themselves
the film was a turning point  in chopra's carrier
after  she had several flops
previously  development
of the film  began in 2006
the films  was a  watch rupee 180 million
us dollar  2.4 million  it opened
on 29 october  2008
to highly  positive  reviews
cryptics  praised  its
screenplay cinematography  music
direction  and performances
it collected  60 girl
us dollar  8.0 million
at the box office  and watch  commercially
successful  fashion received several awards
and nominations  at ceremonies
across india  and the  54th
film fair awards  the film received  seven nominations
including  best director  and one two awards
best actress  for chopra
and best supporting actress  for
run out  it also  won
best address  for chopra
and best supporting actress  for
run out  at the 56th national film awards
several  publications  listed fashion
as  one of the  best women
centric films  in hollywood
